mapper.select: /* com.biz.framework.mapper.ProgramMapper.findProgramMenuList */ SELECT MP.MENU_ID , MP.PROGRAM_ID , P.PROGRAM_NM , P.PROGRAM_URL , P.USE_YN , P.PROGRAM_SRT_ORD FROM MENU_PROGRAM MP LEFT JOIN PROGRAM P ON P.PROGRAM_ID = MP.PROGRAM_ID WHERE MP.MENU_ID = #{menuId} ORDER BY P.PROGRAM_SRT_ORD
